column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I go to my bedroom and select clean clothes to put on after taking a bath .
#id=2
#text=Go into the bathroom and turn on the water at let it run until it reaches a comfortable temperature and reaches a good height .
#id=3
#text=I undress and gently touch the water with my foot to ensure its comfort .
#id=4
#text=Then I go fully into the water and take a deep breath for relaxation .
#id=5
#text=I soap up my wash clothe and start cleaning the parts of my body that are not exposed to the water .
#id=6
#text=After that I stand up and finish soaping my the remainder of my body .
#id=7
#text=I start letting the water drain while turning on the shower and wash my hair .
#id=8
#text=I completely rinse off and dry myself .
#id=9
#text=Then I get dressed and put on some after shower cologne .
#text=I exit the bathroom but leave the door open to remove the steam .
#text=A nice relaxing bath is now complete .
